website_summaries.verdict: This combination laser engraver/3D printer picks up right where it left off in case of a power failure or if filament spool runs out.
pros: Engraves wood, plastic, leather, paper, and other materials
3D printer has dual extruders, which can print 2 of the same objects at once, cutting printing time in half
Pauses job if filament runs out or if you experience power failure
WiFi control lets you control print job using a phone or PC
cons: Cannot have engraving head and printing head installed at the same time

customer_reviews.title: Excellent printer!
customer_reviews.text: I got this product a little over a month ago and have been printing almost non-stop since. There have been no problems or breakdowns of any kind. This is a high quality piece of equipment! I've printed ABS, PLA, TPU and HIPS. As well as combinations of TPU/HIPS and ABS/HPS. This printer was able to handle them all and produce quality prints. Be warned that ABS/TPU/HIPS are all complicated to print with and these are all about having the settings dialed in correctly. The customer service is outstanding. The CEO wrote me personally to answer all of my questions. I couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Macbolan

customer_reviews.title: Easily worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Easily worth the price. I've been working with 3D printers for about 5 years now and have had 6 models before this one. I can say with confidence that this machine is one of the most reliable, feature-filled printers I've found for this kind of price. The laser engraver is just a brilliant add on. You also get an alert when you run out of filament which is great for someone like me who uses every little scrap he can to save money. I'll be buying a second one of these at the end of the year to be able to print more at once.
customer_reviews.author: James W.

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I am new to 3D printing, and this machine is great. With all new skills and machines, there is a learning curve, and I am still very much on it. You do have to tweak things, and get to know your machine a bit. I really do recommend joining a 3D printing community online, as 3D printers tend to be incredibly helpful towards each other. Most of the tricks, tips, and troubleshooting you may need is out there. The company will help in any way they can. Great communication. Haven't tried the laser yet, but the printer works well.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: I love this printer
customer_reviews.text: This has become my workhorse printer. The only thing that has gone wrong is the thermister went bad on extruder #2. I contacted support with the symptoms and they diagnosed the problem right away. The machine comes with a spare so I replaced it and it is up back and running. I have not used the dual extruder setup yet. I have printed PLA and TPU/flexible filaments with no problems. I would highly recommend this printer.
customer_reviews.author: justjeff

customer_reviews.title: The most reliable printer I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I've had this printer for 26 months now & it is a workhorse. I've had a few other printers that required near-constant maintenance & sat idle waiting for replacement parts more than they printed but this thing just goes & goes. I only wish they offered this printer with just a single extruder because I think I've only used the dual-extruder feature twice in the whole time I've owned it. Not saying it's useless by any means & it might be a boon for people who would use it frequently but it's just not something that I personally need or use.
customer_reviews.author: Bruning von Stauffen

customer_reviews.title: Theory does not meet application
customer_reviews.text: It's not easy to put together You should just use YouTube videos and ignore the directions they give. The plastic cover is very fragile. I actually had to reorder this because the first one came with pieces broken so it is what it is. You have to remove the extruders in order to install the laser engraver so this thing is its own project anytime you want to use it. The app that they have is pretty Mickey mouse this did not come with a cover for the USB port and it is pretty complicated to get even a basic print done.
customer_reviews.author: ThemightyTom

customer_reviews.title: Broken from the start
customer_reviews.text: My review is based off my initial use without contacting support. Set up was easy, one screw was missing but I didn’t really care about that. The issue came with the second extruder. The nozzle had no issue heating up, I could manually feed filament through but when trying to print the filament would not feed through the second nozzle. Which makes for useless prints. Didn’t want to bother with getting a replacement part, I expect it to work out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Chugg Family

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome 3D printer, especially for the cost. It comes out of the box and is up in running within less than an hour. The product support documentation is pretty good and if you ever have any issues or questions, their support team is ultra responsive and very informative. I could not be happier. UPDATE 7/13/19: Still running strong! We have an Ultimaker 3 at my work and that is a $4000 printer, it gives me nothing but trouble too. I'm sure my Engineering Manager gets tired of hearing how much better my little Bibo (that I only paid $800 for) is far better and totally reliable, lol.
customer_reviews.author: I'M Ms. Nesbit

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had thought that the power supply was bad but it was my power strip that was the problem. Evelyn at BiBo was very helpful, I am gradually learning to print with this machine, It is a solid machine and I think that it will produce great prints when I get the hang of it. Then we will try the laser engraver that is also included. I didn't give 5 stars on "For beginners" because the documentation/instructions are piecemeal, you have to learn from various sources what to do. I enjoy the challenge so that's OK.
customer_reviews.author: Some dude

customer_reviews.title: CH340G USB Conversion Chip not working
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 16yr old computer savvy son for Christmas to help make parts for my company. Just learned that the CH340G USB conversion chip has never worked- he never told me. Instead he's been using the SD card port and the usb stick port on the tft display. Today, he tried to upload a long print job through the USB port because the TFT display freezes when doing a long print. People have had success when uploading directly from the computer via USB port but our printer's usb port has never worked. I would like to exchange this printer for one that fully works.
customer_reviews.author: VBN, I.

customer_reviews.title: Best customer service I've ever experienced
customer_reviews.text: BIBO has the best customer service I have ever encountered, hands down. That being said, I unfortunately had to return this product. The printer arrived with multiple minor manufacturing defects and very sub-par print quality. BIBO addressed all of my concerns and provided and compensated me for my troubles, but in the end, this printer did not meet my expectations. I give this 4 stars because I believe that their excellent support makes this a risk free purchase and it may be the perfect printer for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: 3D printer & laser engraver
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid unit. It's very easy to setup with a few hiccups along the way. More like a learning curve. But I love and enjoy this unit. Excellent for people that are starting off in The 3D world. It's definitely fun, interesting and you're brain will be put to use. The best experience I had is with customer service. Evelyn is just amazing! Every night I email her about a question or issue, she responds with articles and videos to help me out. She is by far one of the best reps. Would recommend this printer and customer service. *Update Word of advice!!!! Use prusa slicer, latest software. Hands down better prints and faster than Cura slicer .
customer_reviews.author: jackson

customer_reviews.title: No support
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 11-year-old son for his birthday. He and I was super excited to test this out long story short we can’t get this damn thing to print. Then try to actually get somebody to help you impossible. No real videos to help troubleshoot. The website is in Chinese. In the end terrible choice for first timer looking to get into 3D printing.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel B.

customer_reviews.title: Low cost dual extruder printer
customer_reviews.text: As noted by others the technical support is top notch. Just know they operate on China work hours but are very responsive. Package came beat to heck but printer was amazingly just fine. This is a tinkerers printer, so if you enjoy or are ok getting in there for adjustments and some minor assembly this is something you should consider. It’s not something you buy, open the box, plug in, and start getting perfect prints but it’s also not a lot of work to get to good prints either.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome machine
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box...never ran a 3D printer before...it printed the test block perfectly...went to things universe and down loaded a cell phone holder...it printed perfectly first print...I am in my mid 50s...not a computer person and this thing works great...logged onto tinkercad and started making my own parts... thank you Bibo for the great experience!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bill G

customer_reviews.title: Amazing support after purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The printer has great quality and the duel extrusion is a huge plus! However, the best thing about it is the customer service! I did end up have an issue with the printer which turned out to be a faulty part. After trying and failing to troubleshoot it myself, I emailed the support email and received an email back within 24 hours. I ended up having to email them back and forth to troubleshoot what the issue could be. They were very responsive and send pictures and tutorials showing how to test different parts. We found the issue and they got me a replacement part and the printer is back to 100%. 10/10 would buy from BIBO again!
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Decent printer with flaws
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a printer with dual extruders and this one is certainly highly rated. The design is quite poor though as can be seen in my attached pictures. The plastic piece holding the bolt/bearing assembly in the right extruder broke when attempting to swap filament. Edit: customer service was helpful and gave me credit to purchase replacement parts. It's still difficult to load filament, but otherwise is printing nicely
customer_reviews.author: Jake H.

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this printer for nearly 3 years. It performs consistently well. I use all types of filament, including PETG, ABS, PLA, and low-temperature nylons. Recently had a thermistor quit, and this took out the main board. Bibo service was quick and helpful in getting the board replaced, installing the firmware, and getting the printer back up and running. I highly recommend this printer, and will get another one after I eventually wear this one out.
customer_reviews.author: Keith A. Oberg

customer_reviews.title: Great printer and equally great support.
customer_reviews.text: So far this printer has been great. I did have to adjust a few things that were out of whack because of shipping but that is to be expected. I have talked to their support team several times and they are always very helpful and very quick getting back to you. They have gone above and beyond numerous times. They are just as impressive as this printer is in its functionality. I have not tried the laser engraver yet but I will update this review Once I have. Great printer and equally great support. I'm glad I went with Bibo.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a 3D printer before but it was really easy to set up and run. It would be nice if the instruction manual came on a DVD instead of just the SD card because my pc doesn't have an SD slot, I had to purchase a usb card reader to access the manual but that has so far been the only con I have found so far in my 2 months of using it for many projects. I have no needed customer support but they have a facebook group where a representive answers all questions and very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly M

customer_reviews.title: Put together, never used
customer_reviews.text: I got this with high hopes but never used it, never even powered it up. I did follow the instructions on assembly and even though they were defiantly wrote by someone who doesn't translate English well, they are very easy to follow. I got a "welcome aboard" email from Bibo before I even received the printer saying if I had any issues they are there to help. In short, great customer service and really easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: S-8-N

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, I am still learning but so far I ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I am still learning but so far I have been able to print everything I have tried with very little issue. The learning curve for any 3d printer is huge, but so far using the docs and with excellent support from the company that makes this my issues have been minor. I am an absolute novice at this. I am still learning the terminology. The only issue I had was about leveling the bed and the support group provided an instant answer!
customer_reviews.author: redroadster

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this 3d printer a few days ago. it arrived very well packaged and undamaged. it was very simple to put together and it took me about an hour to have the printer up and running. after leveling the print bed i ran all 3 test prints that were included on the SD card. they all came out great right from the start. i did find out that you really do have to use a glue stick on the glass so the filament will stick. I am very happy with the 3d printer and the great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I just started using the printer a few days ago. In this time I have been able to create and print my own design (stove knob lock). I designed this on tinkercad.com and sliced it with Cura. The printer was easy and fairly quick to set up. I have required technical assistance for a couple of questions and the response has been excellent (had an answer within 3 or 4 hours each time). I have not yet tried two filament printing or using the engraver. Will update this review when I try these.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Strait

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding customer care!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first 3D printer purchase and learning the nuances of 3D printing took a little time. There is much for a beginner to learn about 3D printing. This is great printer and I'm very happy with it. Emily at BIBO is extremely patient and helped me understand much of these nuances, as well as some things I was doing wrong, over the course of 2 or 3 weeks. She (and her support team) deserve 5 stars, in addition to printer rating, simply for their care and concern for their customers. If you are thinking of buying your first 3D printer, this is the company you should seriously consider.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Who needs an Ultimaker when you have a Bibo 2 Touch?
customer_reviews.text: Customer support to rival Amazon's! 10 Stars! I love this printer. Its my second one and I am enjoying the laser engraving so much. I was lost at first but you shoot an email to Bibo support and it comes right back with perfect advice and info to take care of anything that is not understood. I am enjoying it so much, that I have not even done any 3D printing yet but I will update this review when I do.
customer_reviews.author: mrjoeyman

customer_reviews.title: Changed rating from 3 to 5
customer_reviews.text: I first gave a 3 star rating because several nuts and bolts fell out of the box when we opened it. But I have to say now I'll give it a 5 star because of Evelyn Cai with there service department. She was very helpful and sent the right info to help me with the printer not heating up. In just a few minutes with her help I was able to locate the problem and it now seems to be working fine.
customer_reviews.author: DARRELL G MONGAR

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer and Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing but positive reviews about this printer. I had ordered a different brand printer a week before and it did not live up to the expectations I had. I returned it and got the Bibo2. I am new to 3d printing but the printer is user friendly and the customer service is top notch. They guarantee a reply within twelve hours and even after their working hours, my customer service representative has helped me out. As they are in China there is a time difference but so far they have not let that get in the way of their service. I highly recommend this printer to anyone looking for good quality in both function and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Calan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great first-time 3d printer
customer_reviews.text: This is my first 3d printer. I was able to get it up and running within an evening. To any beginner, though, I definitely recommend watching YouTube videos for tips and tricks. The most challenging thing for me is getting a print to stick to the glass plate, so lots of false starts. The interface is easy to use and understand. I have not used the dual capabilities of the extruder or the laser engraver yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great service
customer_reviews.text: This printer is very reliable. I've used it to successfully print pla, pva, abs, nylon, polymax, pet, petg and hips. I love having dual extruders. I just had the first problem that I couldn't figure out myself. The printer was randomly stopping in the middle of prints. I was afraid that customer service would be poor for an imported product such as this. Boy was I wrong. It was the BEST customer service I've ever experienced. They replied with helpful ideas. All replies were within an hour and they solved the problem.
customer_reviews.author: marthabstà

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far!
customer_reviews.text: Took a little about an hour to complete the assembly. Product appears to be high quality, and started right up with no problems. I have had a few issues, though I am quite certain they are related to my learning curve as this is my first foray into 3d printing. The support groups have been fantastic and patient with me, I can not recommend this highly enough for those getting started.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer support.
customer_reviews.text: The customer support is great! Emily has really helped me out a lot. I have been printing with other printers for a year. So far this is the best one. Even though I bought this from the Amazon Warehouse Deals and had some screws missing they have sent them to me. I have had no issues printing with PLA and now am learning how to use ABS and HIPS.
customer_reviews.author: L. Crow

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer and Service
customer_reviews.text: "Just started with 3 D printing and Bibo seemed perfect for a novice. I was not disappointed. Some assembly was required (it is about 2/3 assembled) but an afternoon well spent. The printer is outstanding. Moreover, the customer service is the best. They answer inquiries and questions promptly and have been extremely helpful. Printer comes with lots of documentation and videos."
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Will not work. Nothing
customer_reviews.text: I cannot find a way to contact seller. This thing doesn't work. There is no way to connect the laser engraver and the printer only prints the demo codes that came with it. The online program doesn't communicate with the printer dispite using different routes to make a connection. No instructions I find helps. They only give you 2 day return too. Just do your research.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Wow. Great service
customer_reviews.text: The printer is exactly as advertised. I have never worked with one before but the included instructions and videos made set up easy. My students assembled it and got it running. Along the way, one of them pointed out a cracked panel. The whole printer was so well packed that I suspect a student dropped the panel. I told this to BIBO when I asked to buy a replacement. They shipped it free of any charges. The students have already printed three things. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: In the beginning i ran into quite a bit of trouble but the bibo team was so helpful they fixed my issues now I'm up and printing I will update my review if anything changes but so far so good 😁
customer_reviews.author: Taylor McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this printer for about three months now. I was new to 3d printing and after much research, I went with the Bibo. Mostly for the reviews about the service and fantastic customer service. Boy am I glad I did! About a week ago I ran into an issue and long story short, my printer was diagnosed within 24 hours. Not only that but I was told I would be refunded the amount needed to purchase the failed part! Amazing service indeed!
customer_reviews.author: Bob J.

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good printer for the features and price you pay for. I do have two complaints, the top cover is junk, cracked up before using it and the manuals are hard to understand.
customer_reviews.author: gMan

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent printer for the price. Using cura base settings I got it setup and running within about 15 minutes. First prints were very good and only improved from there. Nice interface, elegant design. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rich DeBerardinis

customer_reviews.title: All in one printer with amazing support.
customer_reviews.text: The printer is pretty much a all in one solution. I had a few issues setting up the software. That was due to losing the SD card that came with the printer. Though the support was more than accommodating for helping getting everything set up properly. I don't know if I've actually ever had a company be so responsive to my questions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great printer and support is outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Since I am a first time beginner with 3D printing, it can be overwhelming. I'm retired so it was very fun for me. I love the instant answers I have been receiving when I have a problem. My printer has been running almost 24 hours a day since I got it. I would definitely recommend this printer.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H.

customer_reviews.title: Great printer and laser
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this printer basically non stop since I got it, with multiple filaments from different suppliers. I have used the dual extruder feature with different colors. I haven't had a problem. Everything is very smooth. I have also tested the laser and it is working perfectly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Howard

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best
customer_reviews.text: Great printer need to be patient during set up and follow the directions closely but prints easy right out of the box used a business card to level the bed worked great would recommend for people that don’t like failing prints
customer_reviews.author: Travis O

customer_reviews.title: Great machine.
customer_reviews.text: As a beginner I was cautious and read as many forums and watched videos as I could while I waited for delivery. By the time it arrived I was prepared. Once I jumped in everything went incredibly smooth. The firmware was up to date and everything was level. Take your time. The manual should be translated again but it's all on an sd card with software links to get you off the ground. Beautiful prints from a moron!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Emrys Bourne

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with this printer!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first 3D printer and I am not disappointed. I got this printer in the Fall of 2017. I especially like the fact that it has: duel extrusion, direct drive for better printing, and it even comes with a laser engraver! The prints off of this machine are also incredible. The customer support is superb, giving you multiple ways of contacting them and even responding within a very short time.
customer_reviews.author: Book Maven

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding support and a great printer!
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews about the great tech support and I thought to myself I don’t usually have issues with things but alas after a few prints I did run into an issue and reached out to the support team who quickly responded to me with potential solutions, It ended up being a stupid thing I accidentally did but only came to that conclusion based on the responses I got from the support team, operational again and loving the printer!
customer_reviews.author: Eniqua

customer_reviews.title: Great printer, sturdy, easy to assembly, great support team!
customer_reviews.text: Apart from other printers, this is really sturdy and easy to assembly. I made a mistake pulling the filament as I read other printers need to be handle instead of using the setting->filament menu to unload the filament causing a filament break between the extruder and the motor, email support and they send pictures of how to disassembly the area to remove the broken piece and have the printer working as good as new again. After that experience I always use the setting to load or unload filament and always empty the second extruder if I'm going to work with a single extruder piece.
customer_reviews.author: Jose M Marturell

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the prints is very good, the dual extrusion is pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: Its a quality printer that has lots of neat features. There is a little bit of a learning curve, but that can be said about most 3D printers. The quality of the prints is very good, the dual extrusion is pretty cool, and the laser engraving is very pretty. I enjoy working with it on the daily. I'm always experimenting and stretching my creativity with it. I have used it many time to make birthday gifts for others. And the customer service is unbeatable. Would recommend if you are willing to put the time into the machine
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Good skill.product but you need to carefully check assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Loose parts, I added M3 lockouts to secure limit switches. Nozzle 0.6 not 0.4. Reliable using SD card and latest Curia. About 50 pla prints so far. Red acrylic cover very cheap, tabs break easily, need to print supports.
customer_reviews.author: dfarrell

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Stunning service
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Stunning service. Simple to assemble, and it works like a dream. I ran this printer for 23 hours straight. It did not get too hot, and it made perfect prints. I have just finished my tests with the engraver, and that works perfectly too! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisfost

customer_reviews.title: Good Print quality, excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: As an experienced user and teacher of 3-D technology, i highly recommend the quality and potential of this printer. Clean two color printing, excellent customer service, and the potential for laser cutting (though I have not tried this yet). Though the machine is a little more rickety then the qidi techs I have been using, and it is louder, the print quality is there and very little assembly required
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome printer and awesome support
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, an all out 5 stars from me. Bibo's support has repeatedly been reliable and contacts me always within a few hours. The printer produces some incredible parts and I can confidently say it's the best, inexpensive, dual extruder printer on the market. The only thing I didn't care for is the lack of auto bed-leveling. Admittedly that's a stretch on a printer in this price bracket, but it would definitely add to the ease-of-use factor for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: hotrodman106

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. I had a $300 diy kit and there ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I had a $300 diy kit and there was nothing wrong with it but i wanted to upgrade.. great decision. Absolutely recommend this, read the other reviews it speaks for itself.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: this is my first 3d printer. I was able to ramp up quickly. Leveling the bed is very important, once mastered the prints are good quality. I am using the CURA provided software to convert my STL into g-code and works great too, make sure to load the provided ini setting file. I was able to print few prototypes and saved me a lot of work, I am happy overall.
customer_reviews.author: inline

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and good tech support
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with this printer. It has capabilities that its competitors do not have and if ever have any troubles or need a little help to get started, their tech support team is very friendly and responds very quickly! I was having trouble with a clogged nozzle and their tech support walked me through the steps to resolve the issue. Couldn't be happier I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: I couldn’t be happier! My BIBO has been working flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t be happier! My BIBO has been working flawlessly. Had a slight hiccup with one of the heating elements, but customer support was very responsive, and it was an easy fix. Long story short, it’s rare that a company stands by their product the way these people do. At least in my mind, a company with integrity like this, is one I’ll keep doing business with. A++++
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent printer and support
customer_reviews.text: Printer is surprisingly intuitive, the features are excellent, couldn't be happier with the print quality. I had previously only had 3D printing experience with Dremel 3D40's- the BIBO blows it away IMO. Prints come out cleaner, for all its features, it is exceptionally simplistic (in a good way).
customer_reviews.author: Jon Brace

customer_reviews.title: with good results. The only things i dont like about ...
customer_reviews.text: New to 3d printing. I have used petg, pla, with good results. The only things i dont like about the printer are where the power switch is and the placement of the card reader. Other than those two things i really like this printer, i am new to this so i do have a lot to learn but this printer makes it easy for someone to put it together and start printing. I would not be afraid to buy from bibo again.
customer_reviews.author: darrell morrow

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing so far I really wish I could give all five stars but there were a few minor issues that were fixed by tech support. The support is prompt and helpful but the time difference was annoying for me but thats my fault over all I like it if you are looking for a printer this is a great printer
customer_reviews.author: ely

customer_reviews.title: Amazing 3D printer, beyond phenomenal support!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great printer! I had a lot of trouble at first, but the support was beyond phenomenal. They would always contact back within hours and would help to resolve the problems I was having. I've been using it for about 2 months now and it's still working flawlessly. I highly recommend this printer to beginners or anyone that doesn't enjoy all of the upkeep required for DIY printers (what I came from and ended up giving up on).
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: The device showed up with 3 fewer bolts and nuts than was required to fully assemble it, and the recommended settings never yeilded a successful print. There was absolutely no support and I haven't gotten the device to work once. Very dissatisfied with such an inexpensive waste of desk space.
customer_reviews.author: skylar

customer_reviews.title: Great support on a versatile printer
customer_reviews.text: I've had this printer for 9 months now and it's been a lot of fun learning how to 3-D print. There are a lot of tricks to getting prints to work right but the printer works as expected and the support from BIBO has been top notch. Whenever I need anything, I send them an email and usually get a response within a few hours. They are supporting from China which poses a few challenges but they are dedicated to their customers and have helped me solve my issues (which are usually user error).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This really works well!
customer_reviews.text: This is a Great printer for the price. Easy to use. Also has an engraving feature we are eager to try. The quality of our product is excellent. The shipping was incredibly fast as well. Really like this printer!
customer_reviews.author: dkbethke

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Still have to learn to design something but has worked as expected. I have learned to repair what I have messed up myself.
customer_reviews.author: Joel E. Norwood

customer_reviews.title: Great printer at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: The printer works flawlessly, and is easy to use out of the box (after assembly). Service is prompt and friendly. The free software is a bit difficult for a beginner like myself, so I bought a software product that was more user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald L. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great, easy, not for production
customer_reviews.text: Obviously not intended for production work, this is a very easy to setup, easy to use, high quality print and easily hackable printer.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre Nadeau

customer_reviews.title: Defective fan at arrival
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box and found the fan frame is broken. How can I trust the quality?
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Great 3d printer
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this 3D printer and the amazing customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Need an engineering degree and be fluent in Cantonese to make this POS work.
customer_reviews.text: Way over complicated. Lousy directions. Doesn't work most of the time. $700 in the dumpster. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Service: great.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent support service. Software is friendly PLA prints great. ABS good. Recommendation: Download and print the filament guide holders there is plenty of upgrades available.
customer_reviews.author: Alla

customer_reviews.title: I love this printer
customer_reviews.text: I love this printer. Levelling took a bit. Did it opposite of what it said and prints never came out. But when I did it right. The prints came out great!! Haven't tried the engraver yet but the 3-d printing is excellent! Here is a photo of a witch. 14 hrs later which I don't mind.:-)
customer_reviews.author: Donna Lewellen

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love the Printer works great. Has been a blast to use. Tech support is always there when needed. Just remember to allow time for response.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Moore

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and set up 3d printer
customer_reviews.text: Solid, easy to use and set up 3d printer. After about an evening of setting up and creating their test prints I was ready to start creating parts that I designed for my business. It was that easy. Generally speaking, part quality is very good, although I'll have to play around to get some of the tolerances a little closer. The printer is as good, maybe better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Great potential!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use for beginners, good level of control for advanced users. Great value. Made myself temporary TPU glasses frames when mine broke! Beautiful laser engraving. Tech support is very responsive and considerate. Have found good compatibility with 3rd party slicing software and laser engraving.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Great printer with great support.
customer_reviews.text: I have had several 3D printers. They always take some work to be up and running. With Bibo I was printing in about 90 minutes. I would say what really sets them apart is how fast and easy their support process is. All via email, best to reach out first thing in the morning. I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great product value, easy to use, good support.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Bibo printer as my first 3D printer. It has been a great value with easy setup, two extenders and simple controls to enable good results with my projects. I had one problem caused by a faulty SD card and the technical support from Bibo was very responsive and helpful. I would definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew E. Monaghan

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: New to 3-D printers but know computers. Was able to setup and get running no problem. Print quality is great. . Contacted customer support in China for a few issues and they resolved them quickly. Customer service was great. I would recommend this company and printer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great printer!
customer_reviews.text: So far the printer is great! It took about an hour to be up and running. Easy assembly & downloading the programs. The files provide all the info to set the parameters. Had a small issue of a fan wire coming out of the plug. Between email and live tech support, my problem was resolved the same day and part on the way the next day. The engraver is on my to do list.
customer_reviews.author: Smiles

customer_reviews.title: Service is outstanding
customer_reviews.text: As many other reviews have stated, on the positive side, service is simply outstanding. However, I discovered that service was outstanding because the unit had problems when it arrived. As a result I can not give my purchase experience five stars, although I am very very very impressed with the way customer service provided support and now the machine is working as it should.
customer_reviews.author: David Z.

customer_reviews.title: Haven't made anything yet but it is a better machine then the one I had
customer_reviews.text: Solid and moves smooth. Haven't made anything yet but it is a better machine then the one I had.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: te at factory is a good hand-holder, and patient with even stupid questions
customer_reviews.text: I had some growing pains with this product. There is a lot to learn. te at factory is a good hand-holder, and patient with even stupid questions. The machine is good -- I wish it could be better but appreciate how good it is for the price -- reading other reviews it's better than most. The service, however, has been extraordinary.
customer_reviews.author: Richard R. Ilfeld

customer_reviews.title: Tech support is very responsive
customer_reviews.text: I just got this printer, have it setup now but have not printed yet, there was a wire to the stop micro switch just soldered it, working fine now
customer_reviews.author: Rex Guinn

customer_reviews.title: High Quality printing.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this printer for 1 month now. So far there has been no problem in using this printer. The printing quality is good as shown in the picture. I think that this printer is really good considering the price. Another good thing was the customer service. Whenever I sent emails regarding using this 3d printer, they replied in just next day or in a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Hyunjin Moon

customer_reviews.title: Good printer
customer_reviews.text: Good customer support. I had some issues and they were quick to help. The instructions that come with the printer need a bit of updating, but easy to figure it out. After 2 years with the printer, I have had no major issues. The printer is good quality and perfect for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Chavez.

customer_reviews.title: Quality machine, with outstanding customer support!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with the Bibo 3D printer so far. Perfect prints right out of the box [some assembly required], and the one issue I had, which turned out to be "operator error", was addressed by their customer service in less than 12 hours. Couldn't be happier with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything works great. The dual extruder and the laser engraver feature. Bibo support has been very responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Dbtwiddler

customer_reviews.title: Nice printer.  Great support.
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review based on the great support BIBO has given me. We believe we have figured out the problem. I may have a motor wire that is worn out I have a new set of wires and will install soon. This should solve the problem. I will keep this updated until I get the printer working again. For now I am posting 5 stats because of the wonderful support.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

customer_reviews.title: Update: good customer support for problems during warranty period
customer_reviews.text: Had a broken exruder and they sent me $23 to replace it and extend the warranty by 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B

customer_reviews.title: I think this is a great value with dual printing head and laser for under ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this printer and received it today. Well packaged. We set it up in an hour or two. Started printing right away. We do have a person with 3D printing experience so it went quickly. I think this is a great value with dual printing head and laser for under $1K.
customer_reviews.author: Venture 3 Systems

customer_reviews.title: Great printer, even better support
customer_reviews.text: This printer is a great choice if you want quality and support to safely fall back on. The customer support was extremely supportive and generous with the problems I had, and I can safely say that the printer will make quality models afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: BSL

customer_reviews.title: An excellent printer, accessible to beginners with features for even advanced users
customer_reviews.text: I am still evaluating, so will update soon, but very impressed so far. I am used to an Ultimaker - given the price difference for an equivalent model, I think my final review will be very telling!
customer_reviews.author: Philip W.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I liked the ease of installation. The parts I’ve made are accurate and have a nice finish- this is mainly dependent ont your choice of slicing conditions, extrusion temp, bed temp, material chosen,etc
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, well rounded product for the price. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The customer service is great. The product is well put together. The instructions could use a little more English help, but pretty good overall. There is a bit of a learning curve, but it's not too steep in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Thornock

customer_reviews.title: great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had some issue with the printer. The customer service resolved it professionally and fast. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Poletaeva

customer_reviews.title: Great printer, EXCELLENT support
customer_reviews.text: I would have been stuck if it wasn't for such excellent customer support. The printer is really awesome - love the double extruders. Really happy with my choice of this 3d printer!
customer_reviews.author: Deano

customer_reviews.title: Easy for beginners
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice machine that gets you introduced to 3D printing and is also great for those who have experience with them as well. Once I got the hang of how everything goes(about a week or so) I can’t stop making stuff.
customer_reviews.author: ok game

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: prints really great some little glitches nothing big and support is great
customer_reviews.author: richard carl mailhot

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Service
customer_reviews.text: The customer service is absolutely amazing. 3D printing is still more of an art than a science and the customer support has been tremendous in helping me get up and running.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Mockensturm

customer_reviews.title: Good printer and as for customer service I had a ...
customer_reviews.text: Good printer and as for customer service I had a few questions and wanted updated settings for my slicer. I would say their customer service is outstanding. They replied to my emails usually within 1 hour.
customer_reviews.author: Brad S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome printer.
customer_reviews.text: Love the printer! Awesome and easy to use with great support. Would buy another if I had the chance.
customer_reviews.author: Tou Vang

product_meta.title: BIBO 3D Printer Dual Extruder Sturdy Frame WiFi Touch Screen Cut Printing Time in Half Filament Detect Demountable Glass Bed
feature_bullets: Full Color Touch Screen: with no threshold,which is more friendly and easier operation
Dual Extruder: allows you print the object in two color and print the dissolvable filament for printing support material
Filament detection: if the filament spool runs out during printing, the machine automatically pauses for you to load in a fresh spool, very useful for big volume object printing
WIFI Control: the included networking feature permits you to control the print via a phone or PC
Copy printing: dual extruders can print two same objects at one time, cut your printing time at least in HALF

specifications.Manufacturer: Shaoxing BIBO Automatic Equipment Co., Ltd.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars410 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
